name: It's a Living (Teebowah Games)
description:
Submitted for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams jam, made over the course of roughly 2 months.

CONTROLS

F TO INTERACT

MOUSE CLICK AND HOLD TO PICK UP ITEMS

SPACE TO JUMP

SHIFT FOR LANTERN

(update: It seems the outside in the start may be a bit dark for some folks. There is a lantern if you need it to help you get to the factory, just double tap Shift!)

Note to players: Thank you for checking out our game. We'll be upfront, this is our first effort at using Unity and making a 3D game. We learned as we went and did our best. The end will feel rushed, that is because it was finished within the last hour of the jam. So please, adjust your expectations and please enjoy our effort at creating an atmospheric experience.
